column1: Daily Weather Observations for Brisbane, Queensland for December 2024
Prepared at 06:26 UTC on Thursday  5 December 2024   IDCJDW4019.202412
Most observations from Brisbane City, but some from Brisbane Airport.
Brisbane Airport is located about 12 kilometres north east of the Brisbane City site, and closer to the coast. The evaporation, sunshine and cloud values should be used as a guide only.
Temperature, humidity, wind, pressure and rainfall observations are from Brisbane {station 040913}
Cloud, evaporation and sunshine observations are from Brisbane Aero {station 040842}
